howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.subtitle: Our straightforward application process ensures we find the best teachers who share our passion for education.

step1.title: Submit Your Application
step1.description: Fill out our comprehensive application form with your personal information, teaching experience, and educational background. Make sure to provide accurate and detailed information to help us understand your qualifications.
step1.details: Required documents include your resume, teaching certificates (if any), and a brief cover letter explaining why you want to teach with Top Talks.

step2.title: Initial Screening
step2.description: Our team will review your application within 3-5 business days. We look for candidates who demonstrate excellent English communication skills, patience, and enthusiasm for teaching.
step2.details: If your application meets our initial requirements, you will receive an email invitation to proceed to the next step.

step3.title: Video Interview
step3.description: Schedule a 30-45 minute video interview with our hiring team. This conversation helps us assess your teaching style, communication skills, and cultural fit with our platform.
step3.details: During the interview, you may be asked to conduct a brief teaching demonstration to showcase your ability to engage and educate students.

step4.title: Background Check
step4.description: As part of our commitment to student safety, all potential teachers undergo a comprehensive background check. This process typically takes 5-7 business days to complete.
step4.details: You will need to provide identification documents and authorize the background check process.

step5.title: Onboarding and Training
step5.description: Congratulations! Once approved, you will participate in our comprehensive onboarding program. This includes platform training, teaching methodology workshops, and familiarization with our curriculum.
step5.details: The training program takes approximately 2-3 days and covers everything you need to know to succeed as a Top Talks teacher.

howToStart.title: How to Become a Student
howToStart.subtitle: Getting started is simple and takes just a few minutes. Here's how your English learning journey begins.

step1.title: Sign Up & Assessment
step1.description: Create your account and complete a quick 10-minute assessment to help us understand your current English level and learning goals.
step1.details: This assessment helps us match you with the perfect teacher and customize your learning experience from day one.

step2.title: Meet Your Teacher
step2.description: We'll match you with a qualified teacher based on your assessment results, learning style, and schedule preferences.
step2.details: Schedule your first free trial lesson to meet your teacher and experience our interactive learning platform.

step3.title: Start Learning
step3.description: Begin your personalized English learning journey with regular one-on-one lessons, interactive exercises, and progress tracking.
step3.details: Your teacher will create a customized curriculum based on your goals, whether it's improving conversation skills, grammar, or exam preparation.
